text:
Whether you're a new student or a transfer student,
you'll have new encounters, huh?

Either way, the people at school, in the class,
the whole environment will be new, right?

Yeah,
encounters make the world expand.

Meeting the Producer,
meeting Mano and Hiori, meeting Illumine...
And then, encountering this outfit today.

Since becoming idols,
there have been so many encounters...
It's so much fun every day!
